DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether antioxidant ( vitamin E , selenium lycopene ) change ( reduce ) prostate tumor size blood flow prostate determine MRI image among men Active Surveillance .
DOC.brief_title: Study Antioxidants MRI Detectable Early Stage Prostate Cancer Among Men Active Surveillance
DOC.criteria: MRI detectable prostate cancer PSA le 15 ng/ml Gleason score < = 7 Prostate cancer stag T1c T2a Concurrent use highdose vitamin include selenium , lycopene , vitamin D vitamin E Other malignancy diagnose require treatment within past 5 year ( except superficial bladder cancer basal cell carcinoma ) Current use Proscar Avodart
